name: Mini Morpher
description:
A short puzzle platformer made for the weekly game jam week 150

In a platformer where you have no weapons and no way of fighting for yourself, you must rely on your supernatural ability to morph into your enemies, controlling their every movement. But while you traverse the spooky, monster infested dungeon as one of the monsters who previously tried to kill you, don't forget to watch your original body which moves as normal.

Controls

-W, A, D = Move and jump

-R = Restart

-C = Switch camera view

-Space = Enter morph mode
